Portfolio

  • Beachcomber Game

    2018 - 2018

    • Project URL: https://beachcomber.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://glitch.com/edit/#!/beachcomber

    You a beachcomber on the hunt for treasure! You can dig to try to find some hints, but don't reveal the treasure now while the beach is full, put a flag on all of the treasure you find so you can come back for it later. Right click to place a flag or click the flag/reveal toggle at the top-right. Good luck!

  • Broker Fee Calculator

    2019 - 2019

    • Project URL: https://broker-fee.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://glitch.com/edit/#!/broker-fee

    A calculator that shows what the effective rent would be for an apartment with the broker fee added to the rent.

  • DIY Encryption

    2017 - 2017

    • Project URL: https://diy-encryption.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://github.com/patrickweaver/encryption-flask/

    DIY Encryption is a web app that encrypts text in 3 different ways. It uses small prime numbers to generate public and private keys for public key encryption.

  • Emoji City Transit

    2019 - 2019

    • Project URL: https://emojicitytransit.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://glitch.com/edit/#!/emojicitytransit

    A subway dashboard that shows train statuses using emoji.

  • Emoji Wallpaper

    2018 - Invalid date

    • Project URL: http://emojiwallpaper.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://github.com/patrickweaver/emoji-wallpaper/

  • Glitch to Trello

    2018 - 2018

    • Project URL: https://glitch-to-trello.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://github.com/patrickweaver/glitch-to-trello/

    This project is a first attempt at creating a system for automatically keeping track of Glitch projects in Trello using the Glitch API and the Trello API. If you submit the name of one of your Glitch projects it will create a list of all of your Glitch projects, with the option to create a Trello Board for the project, with a color of your choice. It is written in CoffeeScript which I also wanted to experiment with. The boards for this proof of concept are created in the PatrickWeaverGlitchProjects Team on Trello.

  • Please Confirm You Are A Robot

    2018 - 2018

    • Project URL: http://pleaseconfirmyouarearobot.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://github.com/patrickweaver/please-confirm-you-are-a-robot

    A website that turns the captcha test on its head and asks users to confirm they are robots.

  • Record Player

    2018

    • Project URL: https://record-player.glitch.me
    • Source URL: https://github.com/PatrickWeaver/record-player/

    Record Player is a Rube Goldberg Machine of the Google Cloud Vision API and the Spotify API. After logging into Spotify, upload an image. The image will be sent to the Google Vision API, which will guess what it is. The app will then search Spotify for an album using Google's guess, and give you the first result to play.

    Press:

    • Anil Dash: 'It's like Shazam â€” for your face!'

    • Pitchfork: 'New App Is Basically Shazam for Album Covers'

    • Paste Magazine: 'New App Automatically Recognizes Album Covers'

  • Remixable Space Invaders

    2018 - 2018

    • Project URL: http://remixable-space-invaders.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://github.com/patrickweaver/space-invaders-remixable

    This game is part of Mouse's Serious Games course. It teaches game design concepts by letting players edit parameters in real time to design their own version of Space Invaders.

    Editable parameters include the speed of the invaders, or player, the frequency of shots by the invaders, or player, the shape and color of the invaders or player, and the randomness of the invader's shots.

    Based on Mary Rose Cook's version of Space Invaders.

  • Spades

    2017

    • Project URL: http://spades.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://github.com/patrickweaver/spades

    The game can be played as single player with bot opponents and as real time multi-player (with optional bots).

    Bot opponents are powered by Spades Bot, a Flask app that uses a neural network to generate bot bids. Bot plays are random for now.

  • Vacation Planner

    2019 - 2019

    • Project URL: https://wintercal.glitch.me
    • Source URL: https://github.com/patrickweaver/vacation-planner/

    A visual calendar that helps map out how to use vacation time. The calendar can be built to show a specific window, and have a set of default holidays and policies.

  • Whiteboard Email

    2019

    • Project URL: https://ocr-email.glitch.me/
    • Source URL: https://glitch.com/edit/#!/ocr-email

    An experiment in composing email, write your message on a whiteboard and end it with "send" to send the message.
